p:
Single Likelihood Ancestral Counting (SLAC), Fixed-Effects Likelihood (FEL), and internal FEL (IFEL) methods were used to detect potentially positively selected sites in isolates of 2 recent bottleneck-like events (the occurrence of subtypes NA1 and ON1 in RSV-A; and the waves 4 and 5 emerged from wave 3 and 4 in RSV-B respectively) at a significance level of p < 0.05
27 .
